subject: Re: The ghost detector site.
author: psi_research
full_text:
Since you're getting ready to research the site it could be a good 
opportunity to allow someone in your group who is trying to develop 
psychic skills to see if they recieve impressions you can compare to 
the facts you learn during your fact finding. At least that's what we 
try to do: 1) research public records 2) gather psychic impressions 
3) engage in ITC experiments and paranormal field research. Then 
compare the results of all three methods. oh yeah, plus enjoy 
yourself in the process as it can be amazing. -Bill M

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "kolrone" <a.cronk@...> wrote:
>
